oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hurried sketch of Evansport, Virginia vicinity
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This map was drawn by Pvt. Samuel Sydney Gause, Jr., Co. G, 1st Ark. Inf., Engineer Corps, CSA, in his journal. It shows the Potomac River and Quantico Creek.; The area in the map is now part of the Quantico Marine base. TSLA has Gause's Civil War journal on microfilm (Mf. 88).
